title: Design and Implementation of Online Focus Group Interviews for Veterinary Education Research

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience using online meeting tools and general understanding of veterinary concepts
context.additional_context: Course for Learners Composed of Working Professionals to Practice Online Focus Group Operation Methods for Veterinary Education Research in a Simulation Environment, Acquiring Data Collection Techniques Using Zoom Annotation Features

learning_goals: Learners can design online focus group interview questionnaires aligned with veterinary education research objectives
Learners can apply techniques to facilitate participant interaction using annotation features in digital video conferencing platforms
Learners can explain systematic methods for categorizing qualitative/quantitative data collected from online focus group interviews
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
